summary: Completed testing of BLOCK 67-68 Alert Engine system. Basic alert infrastructure working with 71.4% success rate. Core endpoints operational but alert evaluation engine and Telegram integration have issues.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 500 Internal Server Error when performing dry run alert evaluation
critical_bugs.impact: Cannot test alert triggers before production runs

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 400 Bad Request when sending test alerts

working_endpoints.status: Working correctly - shows 0/3 quota usage with 3 remaining
Working correctly - returns last24h and last7d statistics
Working correctly - returns recent sent alerts
Working correctly - supports level, type, and status filters

ui_bugs.issue: Browser automation failing due to system issues - cannot test AlertsTab UI

integration_issues.issue: Unable to verify AlertsTab.jsx component functionality due to browser automation failure

passed_tests: Alert Quota Status API - correctly shows 3 INFO/HIGH limit per 24h
Alert Statistics API - returns proper last24h/last7d breakdown
Alert Latest API - returns recent sent alerts only
Alert List API - supports pagination and filtering
Alert Filters - level, type, and status filters working

critical_fixes: Fix /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/alerts/check endpoint - 500 error during alert evaluation
Fix /api/fractal/v2.1/admin/alerts/test endpoint - 400 error during test alert sending
Verify alert engine service dependencies and implementation
verification_needed: Test AlertsTab.jsx UI component manually or fix browser automation
Verify Telegram integration configuration for test alerts
